singular.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a singular noun, verb, form etc is used when writing or speaking about one person or thing
singular.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the singular form of the noun
If the subject is singular, use a singular verb.
singular.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He showed a singular lack of tact in the way he handled the situation.
singular.translation[0].definitions[2].e: I wondered why she was behaving in so singular a fashion.
